prompts.flatlay:
Professional e-commerce flat lay photograph of Ron Dorff Crew Neck T-Shirt Eyelet Edition in Sunset Orange.

CRITICAL - GARMENT MUST BE:
- Laid PERFECTLY FLAT on the surface
- ZERO wrinkles, ZERO folds, ZERO bunching
- Fabric completely smooth and pressed-looking
- Natural t-shirt proportions (not stretched)

GARMENT DETAILS - MUST BE EXACT:
- EYELETS: Two small BLACK metal eyelets in the BOTTOM RIGHT corner of the t-shirt (near the hem on the right side). Copy their exact position from the input image.
- COLLAR: Classic crew neck, neatly shaped and round
- SLEEVES: Short sleeves spread naturally to the sides
- Ron Dorff label at inside neckline

COLOR: OMBRE/DIP-DYE gradient - lighter pink-toned at TOP, deeper vibrant sunset orange at BOTTOM. Copy this gradient EXACTLY from input image.

BACKGROUND: Light warm gray studio surface.
LIGHTING: Soft, even studio lighting. No harsh shadows.
prompts.eyelet:
Macro detail shot of the eyelets on Ron Dorff Crew Neck T-Shirt Eyelet Edition in Sunset Orange.

CRITICAL DETAILS:
- Two small BLACK metal eyelets (dark/gunmetal color, NOT silver)
- Eyelets positioned in BOTTOM RIGHT corner of the t-shirt
- Show the smooth gassed cotton fabric texture surrounding the eyelets
- Hem edge of the shirt visible

COMPOSITION: Close-up/macro shot at diagonal angle. Garment laid FLAT - no wrinkles.

COLOR: This is the BOTTOM area of the ombre t-shirt = deep vibrant sunset orange (the darker part of the gradient).

BACKGROUND: Light gray studio surface. Soft even lighting.
prompts.collar:
Detail shot of the collar/neckline on Ron Dorff Crew Neck T-Shirt Eyelet Edition in Sunset Orange, 100% gassed cotton.

CRITICAL DETAILS:
- Classic crew neck collar construction
- Show the Ron Dorff label at the inside neckline
- Smooth 100% gassed cotton texture visible
- Clean, neat stitching around the collar band

COMPOSITION: Top-down 45-degree angle showing collar construction. T-shirt partially visible below collar.

COLOR: Copy the EXACT ombre gradient from the input image - lighter pink-orange at top fading to deeper orange at bottom. The collar area should show the LIGHTER portion of this gradient.

LIGHTING: Professional soft studio lighting. Even illumination.

BACKGROUND: Light gray studio surface.
prompts.sleeves:
Detail shot of the sleeve construction on this crew neck t-shirt.

WHAT TO PHOTOGRAPH:
- Short sleeve of the t-shirt, showing the full sleeve from shoulder seam to hem
- Smooth gassed cotton texture clearly visible
- Sleeve hem finishing/edge detail with clean stitching

COMPOSITION:
- T-shirt laid flat, camera focused on ONE sleeve
- Top-down 45-degree angle
- Show the sleeve spread naturally to the side
- Include part of the shoulder seam for context

GARMENT DETAILS FROM INPUT IMAGE:
- Copy the EXACT fabric texture from the input - smooth, high-quality gassed cotton
- Clean double-stitched hem at sleeve edge
- Natural sleeve shape and fit

COLOR: Copy the EXACT ombre gradient from the input image - lighter pink-orange at top, deeper orange at bottom. The sleeve area should show the appropriate portion of this gradient based on its position on the garment.

STYLING: Sleeve laid flat and smooth, showing the relaxed fit and construction quality.

LIGHTING: BRIGHT professional e-commerce studio lighting. Clean, even, well-lit exposure. No dark shadows, no moody lighting. This should look like a bright, clean product photo - NOT dark or underexposed.

BACKGROUND: LIGHT warm gray studio surface - bright and clean, not dark.
prompts.front:
E-commerce on-model photo. Copy the pose and composition from the LAST reference image.

IMAGE ORDER:
- Image 1: Model headshot - use this EXACT model ({{modelDesc}})
- Images 2+: Product photos of the {{productColor}} {{shortProductName}}
- LAST image: Pose/composition reference

MODEL: Use the EXACT model from image 1. Same face, same skin tone, same build.

OUTFIT - MUST MATCH EXACTLY:
- TOP: {{productColor}} {{shortProductName}} from the product images. Ombre gradient (lighter pink-orange at top, deeper sunset orange at bottom). Crew neck, short sleeves, black metal eyelets at hem.
- BOTTOMS: {{bottomsDesc}} - copy EXACTLY from input images, no substitutions.

POSE: Match the reference photo (last image). Front-facing, waist up. Confident, relaxed stance.

LIGHTING & BACKGROUND: Copy the lighting and background from the reference image - bright, clean e-commerce studio with light gray backdrop.
prompts.3/4:
E-commerce on-model photo. Copy the pose and composition from the LAST reference image.

IMAGE ORDER:
- Image 1: Model headshot - use this EXACT model ({{modelDesc}})
- Images 2+: Product photos of the {{productColor}} {{shortProductName}}
- LAST image: Pose/composition reference

MODEL: Use the EXACT model from image 1. Same face, same skin tone, same build.

OUTFIT - MUST MATCH EXACTLY:
- TOP: {{productColor}} {{shortProductName}} from the product images. Ombre gradient (lighter pink-orange at top, deeper sunset orange at bottom). Crew neck, short sleeves. IMPORTANT: Black metal RON DORFF eyelets on lower right of t-shirt MUST be clearly visible.
- BOTTOMS: {{bottomsDesc}} - copy EXACTLY from input images, no substitutions.

POSE: Match the reference photo (last image). 3/4 body shot from mid-thigh up. Standing pose, body angled. Frame shot so eyelets on t-shirt hem are visible.

LIGHTING & BACKGROUND: Copy the lighting and background from the reference image - bright, clean e-commerce studio with light gray backdrop.
